code: import React from"react";import{Card,Col,Row}from"react-bootstrap";import Zoom from'react-reveal/Zoom';import ErrorMsg from"./ErrorMsg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cardse=_ref=>{let{itemsData}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Zoom,{children:itemsData.length>=1?itemsData.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{sm:"12",className:"my-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"d-flex flex-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{className:"img-item",variant:"top",src:item.imgUrl}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-title",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-price",children:item.price})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{as:"div",className:"py-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-description",children:item.description})})]})]})},item.id);}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"my-3 text-center fw-bold fs-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMsg,{})})})});};export default Cardse;//as='div' : to rwap content of Card.Text in div
